variable_list.description: should be Between 10 to 1000.  Delete operation dependent only on "Priority" and "VPC Name", No other information required.
variable_list.name: priority
variable_list.label: Priority of route

variable_list.description: Mandatory if Protocol Type = "PROTOCOL NUMBER".    EX :- 80.  Note - Keep 0 for other Protocol Types.
variable_list.name: protocol_number
variable_list.label: Protocol Number

variable_list.description: Choose "INTERNET" for "External", "ALL" for "Any" and "CUSTOM" for Custom.
variable_list.name: source_address_type
variable_list.label: Source Address Type

variable_list.description:
Mandatory if Source Address Type = "CUSTOM".  
 Ex :- 10.10.10.0/24
variable_list.name: source_ip_prefix
variable_list.label: Source IP Prefix

variable_list.description: Choose "INTERNET" for "External", "ALL" for "Any" and "CUSTOM" for Custom.
variable_list.name: dest_address_type
variable_list.label: Destination Address Type

variable_list.description: Mandatory if Destination Address Type = "CUSTOM".    Ex :- 10.10.10.0/24
variable_list.name: destination_ip_prefix
variable_list.label: Destination IP with Prefix

variable_list.description: This is mandatory if Action is "REROUTE". Ex:- 10.10.10.10
variable_list.name: service_ip_list
variable_list.label: Service IP for REROUTE
